بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا ما اشترت يونه ابنت حليصا اشترت من زوجها يزيد الخرّاز الخرّاز منزل له في علا
مدينة إدفوا بما غلق عليه بابه وأحاطت به جدرانه داخل فيه وخارج منه بجميع حقوقه وحدوده
وأرضه وسمائه وأركانه الأربع جماعة هذا المنزل حدّه القبلي منزل سواد بن بقونس الدّبّاغ ومعصرة النّضر الزّيّات
وأشراكه حدّه الغربي منزل بلتوس الطّبيب والممر بينهما وحدّه البحري يلي منزل قيس
بن هرون النّجّار والممر بينهما وحدّه الشّرقي يلي منزل سواد الحرّاث وباب هذا
المنزل مفتوح إلى البحري اشترت يونه ابنت حليصا من زوجها يزيد الدّبّاغ هذا
المنزل المحدود الموصوف في هذا الكتاب بجميع حقوقه وحدوده بدينر وزن
الڤاسم حدوده وحده المثاقيل الجديد قد نقدت يونه ابنت حليصا زوجها يزيد الدّبّاغ
الدّينر ثمن المنزل وسلّم يزيد الدّبّاغ إلى زوجته يونه ابنت حليصا المنزل كلّه
بجميع حقوقه وحدوده ومرافقه وأبرته يونه ابنت حليصا من الدّينر وقبضت
يونه المنزل وصار مال من مالها وفي ملپكپهاملكها بالثّمن المسمّا في هذا الكتاب
وهو دينر مثقال بعد تعرّف من يونه ابنت حليصا بما اشترت قبل الاشترا
ومعرفة من يزيد الدّبّاغ بما باع قبل البيع وتعرّفهما جميعا بما في هذا الكتاب
بعد البيع عن تراض فإن لحق يونه ابنت حليصا درك من أحد من النّاس فعلى يزيد
الدّبّاغ إنقاذ نفاذ بيعه وخلاصه على بيع الإسلم وعهدپةوعهده الإسلم شهد على ذلك
إلپشع إلپشع بن عيسى وهو كاتب الكتاب وشهادته في ذي القعدة سنة تسع وثلثين ومائتن
وعلي بن عبد الأعلى بن معوية وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وعبد اللّه بن زكري وكتب شهادته بخطّه
شهد أحمد بن محمّد القيسي بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب
وعبد الأعلى بن معوية بن عبد الأعلى وكتب شهادته على يزيد الدّبّاغ وعلى إقرار يونه بالقبض والدّفع
وشهدته في ذي القعدة سنة تسع وثلثين ومائتين
وعبّاب وغيّاث وعباب وعبّاب وعتّاب وعنّاب بن محمّد بن مراد وكتب شهادته بيده على إقرار
يزيد بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
شهد على ذلك عبد اللّه بن الحجّاج بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وشهادته في ذي القعدة
سنة تسع وثلثين ومائتن // وعبد الأوّل بن عبد العزيز وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وهرون بن إسحق وكتب شهادته بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
وعبد الصّمد بن هرون وكتب شهادته بخطّه //
وحميد بن پن عبيد وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وأحمد بن موسى وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وعيسى بن موسى وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وحسين بن علي الخراساني وكتب شهادته على إقرار يزيد بن قاسم
الدّبّاغ بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب شهادته بخطّه //
علي بن مومل وكتب شهادته على إقرار يزيد
بن قاسم الدّبّاغ بجميع ما في
هذا الكتاب

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
This is what Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, has bought: she has bought from her husband Yazîd, the leather-bottle merchant, a dwelling house belonging to him, in the upper part of
the town of Edfû, with what its door encloses and its wall(s) encompass (both) within and without, with all the rights and boundaries thereof,
and its land and its sky and its four corners. The southern boundary of this dwelling house is (formed) in its entirety (by) the dewlling house of Sawâd b. Baqaunis, the tanner, and the press of an-Naḍr, the oilseller,
and his fellow holders; its western boundary is (formed by) the dwelling house of Pilatos, the physician, and the passage between them both; and its northern boundary borders on the dwelling house of Qais
b. Harûn, the carpenter, and the passage between them both; and the eastern boundary borders on the dwelling house of Sawâd, the ploughman, and the door of this
dwelling house opens to the north. Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, has bought from her husband Yazîd, the tanner, this
dwelling house, defined and described in this contract, with all its rights and boundaries, for one dînâr, according to
the new (standard) weight of the miṯqâls. Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, has paid to her husband Yazîd, the tanner,
the dînâr as the price for the dwelling house, and Yazîd, the tanner, has handed over to his wife Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, the dwelling house in its entirety,
with all its rights and boundaries and appurtenances, and Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, has given him a quittance for the dînâr, and Yûna
has taken over the dwelling house and it has become her own property and (has come) into her possession for the price named in this contract,
and this is one dînâr miṯqâlî, after that Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, had taken cognizance of that which she has bought before the purchase,
and (after) the cognizance of Yazîd, the tanner, in respect to that which he has sold before the sale; and (after) they both have taken cognizance of all that (is contained) in this act
after the sale, on the ground of their (mutual) consent. But if any evil consequence (therefrom, vindicatio) should befall Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ, from any other person, then the
recuperation for its sale and its indemnification are incumbent upon Yazîd, the tanner, according to Islamic law of sale and Islamic deed of sale. There have testified to it:
Al-Yasaʿ b. ʿÎsâ, who is the writer of the document, and his testimony has been given in Ḏu ʾl-Qaʿda of the year two hundred and thirty nine.
And ʿAlî b. ʿAbd al-Aʿlâ b. Muʿâwiya, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And ʿAbdallâh b. Zakariya, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. And ʿAbdallâh b. Zikrî, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
Aḥmad b. Muḥammad al-Qaisî, is witness respecting all that (is contained) in this act, and he has written. (Paragraph sign).
And ʿAbd al-Aʿlâ b. Muʿâwiya b. ʿAbd al-Aʿlâ, who has written his testimony with regard to Yazîd, the tanner, and to the acknowledgment by Yûna respecting the receipt and the delivery,
and his testimony (has been given) in Ḏu ʾl-Qaʿda of the year two hundred and thirty nine.
And Ġiyâṯ b. Muḥammad b. Murâd, who has written his testimony with his (own) hand to the acknowledgment
by Yazîd of all that (is contained) in this act. (Paragraph sign).
ʿAbdallâh b. al-Ḥaǧǧâǧ has been witness to it respecting all that (is contained) in this act, and his testimony (has been given) in Ḏu ʾl-Qaʿda
of the year two hundred and thirty nine. And ʿAbd al-Awwal b. ʿAbd al-ʿAzîz, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.

And ʿAbd aṣ-Ṣamad b. Hârûn, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And Ḥamîd b. ʿUbaid, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And Aḥmad b. Mûsâ, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And ʿÎsâ b. Mûsâ, who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
And Ḥusain b. ʿAlî, the Ḫurâsânî, who has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd b. Qâsim,
the tanner, respecting all that (is contained) in this act, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
ʿAlî b. Muʾammal, who has written his testimony to the acknowledgment by Yazîd

Herein is the act concerning the dwelling house of Yûna, daughter of Ḥelîṣâ.
